Articles.Content:
Last Kerbal Standing

Well now it's time to say good bye to Jeb and all his kin.
And they would like to thank you folks fer kindly droppin in.
You're all invited back next page to this locality
To have a heapin helpin of their hospitality

Page that is, sit a spell, take your shoes off.

You all say New Page, ya hear!

Edited February 15, 2022 by ColdJ
